name: THE ESTEE LAUDER COMPANIES INC.
goal: ELC is a global manufacturer of high end cosmetic products. ELC sells its products through selective distribution channels in more than 140 countries, including the EEA Member States.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Cosmetic legislation, REACH, Product Safety and Market Surveillance, Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP), Access to Genetic Resources and the Fair and Equitable Sharing of Benefits Arising from their Utilization in the Union, Data Protection and e-Privacy, Consumer legislation, Digital Single Market, Circular Economy and Plastic Strategy, Brexit and Trade.
